Name: DD016 - email to the manager for approval for any form
Output_template:
{"subject":"New {form_name} awaiting approval","fromName":"{fullName}","from":"{senderEmail} ","recipients_to":"{managerEmail}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"
Hello,

A new {form_name} form has been submitted.

Please click on this link to approve or reject the request.

Yours sincerely,

Portsmouth City Council

","attachments":""}
